mapper.insert: insert into boardreply(no, num, content, userid, ip) values (#{no}, boardsq.nextval, #{content}, #{userid}, #{ip} )
mapper.select: select num,content,userid, to_char(replydate, 'MM-DD HH:MI') replydate from boardreply where no=#{param1} order by num desc
mapper.update: update boardreply set content =#{param2} where num=#{param1}
